meanings.definition: Efforts made in opposition to another effort.
meanings.sent1: The counterefforts of the team to win the game were impressive.
meanings.sent2: The counterefforts of the firefighters saved the building from burning down.
meanings.sent3: The counterefforts of the squirrel to steal the bird's food were amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her counterefforts to stay awake during the boring lecture were like a battle against sleep.
meanings.sent5: The counterefforts of the students to finish the project on time were truly commendable.

meanings.definition: Actions taken to counteract or oppose something.
meanings.sent1: The counterefforts against the spread of misinformation were successful.
meanings.sent2: The counterefforts to reduce pollution in the city were well-received by the community.
meanings.sent3: His counterefforts to resist eating the tempting cake were quite amusing to his friends.
meanings.sent4: The counterefforts to mend the strained relationship were like trying to piece together a broken mirror.
meanings.sent5: The counterefforts of the activists to protect the environment were inspiring to many.
